text: "Ch!pz in Black (Who You Gonna Call)" is a song by Dutch pop group Ch!pz. It reach #2 in the Netherlands Top 40 and #1 in Netherlands Top 100. It’s certified Platinum according to NVPI. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2003–2006) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2003) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) | 18 |- ! scope="row"| Netherlands (Single Top 100) | 9 |} {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2005) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Austria (Ö3 Austria Top 40) | 4 |- ! scope="row"| Germany (Official German Charts) | 10 |- ! scope="row"| Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) | 9 |} {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2006) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 65 |} ==References== Category:2003 singles Category:2003 songs
title: Ch!pz in Black (Who You Gonna Call)
